name: lizord
description:
lizards and selling them

non-pregnant lizards will seek out apples

pregnant lizards will seek out pink apples

baby lizards need space to grow up

old lizards cannot mate

all lizards die after a long life of six minutes

$$$$$ can be made by selling lizards and things

no saving currently! but soon!

you might lose your first few times! that is ok! there is no way to get eggs once you run out currently, in later builds thatll be a lose condition

this is a sort of a draft build of this game, more stuff soon
